main event: A civilian observed a solid object in Clovis, California, which changed appearance from green flickers to reddish sparks.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a uniform course and was observed for about 20-30 seconds., The sighting was made under clear sky conditions with no wind., The object appeared solid and was compared to the brightness of automobile headlights., Another witness, an off-duty air force man, also saw something similar in the area., There was speculation that the object could be satellite debris.
witness description: The primary witness is a civilian; an off-duty air force man was also reported to have seen something.
